Class Graph

  • java.lang.Object
    • Graph
  • public class Graph
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to hold data about an undirected graph. The purpose is to make the data more flexible, easier to modify and access efficiently

    modified from https://codereview.stackexchange.com/questions/171029/finding-largest-graph-cliques-in-java to fit the date structure of this program.

    Author:
    Rodion "rodde" Efremov, Alain van Rijn
